ygData.subject: fPIC problem on 64-bit RH Enterprise Linux 5

Hi,

I downloaded cantera 1.7.0 yesterday from sourceforge.

I get an error=
 when running "make python-install" with the message
that I need to recompi=
le with -fPIC.

I have seen several emails with the same topic.  But some o=
f them
indicate that the problem was resolved in version 1.7.1.  Where can =
I
find that version (I looked briefly at the CVS and did not see
anything n=
ewer than 1.7, except for Makefile.in)?

(I am not super-comfortable modify=
ing the makefiles, but with clear
enough instructions I am willing to do it=
).

In case it is of relevance, I think I have 64-bit python, simply
becaus=
e my python2.4 sits in the /usr/lib64 directory.  (It came
pre-installed)

=
Thank you very much,

Mirko
